reviews.body: Absolutely loved the Sausage, Egg & Cheese sandwich! The flavors were on point and the portion size was perfect. Definitely coming back for more.
The Sausage, Egg & Cheese sandwich was really tasty, especially the sauce they use. It's a bit pricey but worth it for the quality you get.
The Sausage, Egg & Cheese sandwich was okay. I think it's a bit overrated and overpriced. I've had better sandwiches for cheaper.
